reuters.title: PIRELLI GROUP <PIRI.M> UNIT SELLS CABLE
reuters.body: Pirelli group unit Pirelli Cable Corp's communications division said it signed a cable supply contract with NYNEX Corp <NYN> unit, NYNEX Enterprises. The company said Pirelli will supply NYNEX with fiber optic cables over the next year. Terms of the contract were not disclosed. Reuter 
